name: bj-exlime
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wex(s0, w1), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wex(s0, w1), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wex(s0, w1), w1)
-| wi(w0, w1)

comment: Variant of ~ exlimih where the nonfreeness of ` x ` in ` ps ` is expressed using an existential quantifier, thus requiring fewer axioms. (Contributed by BJ, 17-Mar-2020.)
